name: Grapple Guy (wyrlor)
description:
Just as a warning, this game is the unholy abomination that was created due to my interest in both learning game development and my desire to ruin people's days. Currently it isn't super complete so if you find any bugs or have any suggestions please let me know.  Watch the full story on this game here.
